# This script search a trade condition matching to the order
 # and try to complete some fields
 order = context
 trade_condition_list = []
 N_ = context.Base_translateString
 
 trade_condition_portal_type = 'Purchase Trade Condition'
 trade_condition_list = order.getSpecialiseValueList(portal_type=(
 trade_condition_portal_type,))
 
 if len(trade_condition_list)==0:
 # Search a matching Trade Condition
 trade_condition_list = context.portal_domains.searchPredicateList(order,
 portal_type=('Purchase Trade Condition',), test=0)
 
 # Results
 if len(trade_condition_list ) == 0 :
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % ( context.absolute_url(), form_id
 , 'portal_status_message='+ N_('No Trade Condition.'))
 elif len(trade_condition_list ) > 1 :
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % ( context.absolute_url(), form_id
 , 'portal_status_message=' + N_('Too many Trade Conditions.'))
 else :
 trade_condition=trade_condition_list[0].getObject()
 
 # Update Order Profile
 categories = order.getCategoryList()
 # Destination
 if order.getDestinationValue() == None and \
 trade_condition.getDestinationValue() is not None :
 categories += ('destination/'+trade_condition.getDestination(),)
 # destination_decision
 if (order.getDestinationDecisionValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getDestinationDecisionValue() is not None) :
 categories += ('destination_decision/'+
 trade_condition.getDestinationDecision(),)
 # destination_administration
 if (order.getDestinationAdministrationValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getDestinationAdministrationValue() is not None) :
 categories += ('destination_administration/'+
 trade_condition.getDestinationAdministration(),)
 # destination_payment
 if (order.getDestinationPaymentValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getDestinationPaymentValue() is not None) :
 categories += ('destination_payment/'+trade_condition.getDestinationPayment(),)
 
 # source
 if order.getSourceValue() is None :
 if trade_condition.getSourceValue() is not None :
 categories += ('source/'+trade_condition.getSource(),) 
 # source_section
 if order.getSourceSectionValue() is None :
 # if source_section is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order source
 if trade_condition.getSourceSectionValue() is not None :
 categories += ('source_section/'+trade_condition.getSourceSection(),)
 elif trade_condition.getSourceValue() is not None:
 categories += ('source_section/' + trade_condition.getSource(),)
 # source_decision
 if order.getSourceDecisionValue(portal_type='Organisation') is None :
 # if source_decision is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order source
 if trade_condition.getSourceDecisionValue(portal_type='Organisation')\
 is not None :
 categories += ('source_decision/'+trade_condition.getSourceDecision(
 portal_type='Organisation'),)
 elif order.getSourceValue() is not None:
 categories += ('source_decision/'+order.getSource(),)
 # source_administration
 if order.getSourceAdministrationValue() is None :
 # if source_administration is not defined on TradeCondition,
 # use Order source
 if trade_condition.getSourceAdministrationValue() is not None :
 categories += ('source_administration/' +
 trade_condition.getSourceAdministration(),)
 elif order.getSourceValue() is not None:
 categories += ('source_administration/'+order.getSource(),)
 # source_payment
 if order.getSourcePaymentValue() is None :
 # if source_payment is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order source
 if trade_condition.getSourcePaymentValue() is not None :
 categories += ('source_payment/'+trade_condition.getSourcePayment(),)
 elif order.getSourceValue() is not None:
 categories += ('source_payment/'+order.getSource(),)
 
 # Copy Price Currency
 if (order.getPriceCurrencyValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getPriceCurrencyValue() is not None) :
 categories += ('price_currency/'+trade_condition.getPriceCurrency(),)
 
 # Copy Incoterm
 if (order.getIncotermValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getIncotermValue() is not None) :
 categories += (trade_condition.getIncoterm(),)
 
 # Copy Delivery Mode
 if (order.getDeliveryModeValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getDeliveryModeValue() is not None) :
 categories += (trade_condition.getDeliveryMode(),)
 
 destination_decision_source_reference = ''
 if order.hasDestinationDecisionSourceReference() :
 destination_decision_source_reference = \
 order.getDestinationDecisionSourceReference()
 elif trade_condition.hasDestinationDecisionSourceReference() :
 destination_decision_source_reference = \
 trade_condition.getDestinationDecisionSourceReference()
 
 # copy PaymentCondition if no one is defined on Order
 filter_dict = {'portal_type': 'Payment Condition'}
 if len(order.contentIds(filter = filter_dict)) == 0 :
 to_copy = trade_condition.contentIds(filter = filter_dict)
 if len(to_copy)>0 :
 copy_data = trade_condition.manage_copyObjects(ids=to_copy)
 new_id_list = order.manage_pasteObjects(copy_data)
 
 # copy Discount if no one is defined on Order
 filter_dict = {'portal_type': 'Discount'}
 if len(order.contentIds(filter = filter_dict)) == 0 :
 to_copy=[]
 to_copy=trade_condition.contentIds(filter = filter_dict)
 if len(to_copy)>0 :
 copy_data = trade_condition.manage_copyObjects(ids=to_copy)
 new_id_list = order.manage_pasteObjects(copy_data)
 
 # Update specialise value of Order
 final_categories = ()
 for category_item in categories :
 if category_item.find('specialise/') == (-1):
 final_categories += (category_item,)
 
 final_categories += ('specialise/'+trade_condition.getRelativeUrl(),)
 
 order.edit(
 categories = final_categories,
 destination_decision_source_reference =
 destination_decision_source_reference )
 
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % (context.absolute_url(), form_id,
 'portal_status_message='+N_('Order updated.'))
 
 if batch_mode:
 return None
 else:
 context.REQUEST[ 'RESPONSE' ].redirect( redirect_url.replace(' ', '+') )
